description: William is one of those nice guys who is silent but deadly, so to speak. We asked him what he likes sexually, and he was very straight-forward about it. “When I fuck people, I like to start out nice and slow to set the mood, then I just go HAM.” We were curious as to what that meant, so he explained the acronym. “Hard as a motherfucker.” William meant business, and with a fit body like that, we knew that he was hardcore and disciplined. Watching him jerk off and seeing his body flex with each stroke was pretty incredible. Even though he has a calm demeanor, he sure knows how to use that dick of his!
title: William
